# Project Brief

**Name**: MedFlash

**Description**: AI-powered flashcard generator for medical students

**Created**: 2026-01-18

## Goal
Help medical students study more effectively by automatically generating flashcards from their PDF course materials. The AI analyzes both text and images (diagrams, schemas, anatomical illustrations) to create comprehensive study materials.

## Target Users
- Medical students (pre-clinical and clinical)
- Nursing students
- Healthcare professionals studying for certifications

## Key Features
1. PDF upload (max 20MB)
2. AI-powered flashcard generation with Gemini
3. Visual content extraction (diagrams, schemas)
4. Flashcard preview with flip animation
5. PDF export for printing or offline study

## Constraints
- No user accounts
- No data persistence
- Process in memory only
- Single file upload per session

## Tech Stack
- TanStack Start/Router
- Google Gemini AI
- Bun runtime
- Tailwind CSS v4
